name: The Nameless Mausoleum Alpha Demo
description:
I can guarantee that the gamesave format must be deprecated in next version because I originally prepared to upload when the scene arrangement was stable enough.

The reason that I upload the game at this moment is just to use itco.io as cloud drive, for my friends to test whether the gameplay is fun enough.
Yet welcome everyone who loves side-scrolling to be my friends.
If you don't mind playing from the beginning again and again when I upload new version, take it! And, looking forward to your feedback!
